posts.post_content: Venser is as useful a combo card with this as you would think, it only returns it at the end of turn, which, in a burn deck, would be fine, but i wouldn't splash a venser in a burn deck. blue white would be hard to make work in burn deck for a single card, and if you were to run more than one, i'd still rather run more burn... chaining four together for storm seems to be the best bet, or throwing it in with the red mana ramp cards, again for either storm or fireball, or something like that, a great piece for many combos
posts.html:
